description:
One of the few male Sekirei seen other than Shiina.
He was once a member of the First Disciplinary Squad.
Mutsu carries a sword with him as his weapon, but has never drawn it.
The few times he has been in action, he has been shown to slam the butt of the scabbard to the ground, creating shockwaves and large fissures, suggesting that he may possess earth-based powers.
His only attack shown is Kasaiten (Smashing Point).
name: Mutsu
